archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0746
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As customer, when I have a question or need to change something on an order, I want ability to ask questions and make changes to the order, from the order itself, so that I can be sure my changes are captured and saved.

properties.value: What kind of changes? to be discussed on dedicate workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
